dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 4198 IH: Appropriate Care for Disabled Veterans Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Denham introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veteransâ€™ Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to reinstate the requirement for an annual report on the capacity of the Department of Veterans Affairs to provide for specialized treatment and rehabilitative needs of disabled veterans.

section.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Appropriate Care for Disabled Veterans Act
.

section.header: Extension of requirement for report on the capacity of the Department of Veterans Affairs to provide for specialized treatment and rehabilitative needs of disabled veterans
section.text: The first sentence of section 1706(b)(5)(A) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by striking through 2008.
